eu.cqse.check.base

Class EntityFirstLineFindingCheckBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.cqse.check.framework.core.CheckImplementationBase
      • eu.cqse.check.base.EntityCheckBase
        • eu.cqse.check.base.EntityFirstLineFindingCheckBase

  • public abstract class EntityFirstLineFindingCheckBase
extends EntityCheckBase
    Base class for checks that select a set of entities via xPath and create a finding on the first line for each selected entity.
